original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.90. Sanidassanattika, Arūpāvacaraduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ arūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sani dassana ttika a rūpa avacara duka  anidassana appaṭigham arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: The Chapter on the Conditions🔽The Section on the Triad of the Conditions🔽With-object-of-consciousness, formless-world

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanaarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na arūpāvacaram dhammam paccayā na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
